radiographic_examinations.findings: New small right and trace left pleural effusions with adjacent dependent atelectasis, interlobular septal thickening, and ground-glass opacities. Trace pericardial fluid is within physiologic limits. Severe mitral annulus calcification. A 2.7 cm hepatic cyst in segment II is unchanged. The right lower quadrant transplant pancreas demonstrates increased adjacent fat stranding with adjacent lateral conal fascia thickening. The pre-existing adjacent small peripancreatic fluid collection is not appreciably changed measuring approximately 12 mm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Postsurgical changes in the anterior abdominal wall appears similar to the prior examination. Nonspecific presacral fat stranding is unchanged. A 2.9 cm simple appearing right adnexal cyst is unchanged.
